reviews.review: Cheater ridden game. public gaming is dead, long live cheating.
toxic community, and if u are doing good they think ur a hacking... and try to prove it like their life depends on it

This Game is f**kin amazing. If you want an fps with a straight forward objective, there ya go. another great thing is you can run the game on whatever potato of a laptop you got with minimal to no lag.I'm lovin' it. if any of my friends wanted an fps, this would be the first game I would suggest.
Лучшая игра в мире. Я ебал рот всех поляков и немцев, с которыми я играю.
bu oyunu oynarken güzel bilgisayar ve fps son olarakta güzel bir kulaklık lazımdır yani tavsiye ediyorum demektir bb
Arkadaslar almayin durduk yere ban yedim banimida acmadilar paraniza yazik
Très bon jeu, un classique, un must have des fps
no skill based, random shooting, full of hackers and smurf
very loco , muy bom , game otimo... xD
CS, ainda sim é o melhor jogo da atualidade. Senão o melhor, no meu ponto de vista!
This game is not good. Bad community, bad mechanics, overpowered guns, so many hackers.
